1.0.0.name: wordpress/yugioh-card-links
1.0.0.description: The goal of the TCGplayer.com Plug-in is to provide an instantaneous way for you to turn all Yu-Gi-Oh! card names within your blog posts into card information links with Hi-Mid-Low pricing! You never need to highlight a card name and hit a button over and over again. Just type up your entire post and then click the "Card Parse Article" button. All Yugioh card names are instantly turned into links that have a hover effect showing the card image and its current Hi-Mid-Low price from the internets cheapest vendors!
